寂靜: (せきせい) - calmness/stillness/tranquility; (じゃくじょう only)  calmness of the heart/enlightenment
寃罪: (えんざい) - false charge; false accusation; misrepresentation
寄える: (よそえる) - to compare/to liken; to use as a pretext
寄こす: (よこす) - to send/to forward; to hand over (e.g. money)
寄す: (よす) - to bring near; to put close; to let come near
寄せ: (yose) - last moves (no go, shogi ou xadrez), endgame; gathering, collecting, coming together
寄せかける: (よせかける) - to rest or lean against
寄せつける: (よせつける) - (often used in the negative as 寄せ付けない, etc.) to let (someone) come near; to let (someone) get close
寄せては返す: (よせてはかえす) - (waves) to break on the shore and retreat
寄せる: (よせる) - to come near/to let someone approach; to bring near/to bring together/to collect/to gather; to deliver (opinion, news, etc.)/to send (e.g. a letter)/to contribute/to donate; to let someone drop by; to add (numbers); to have feelings for (love, good will, trust, etc.); to rely upon for a time/to depend on; to use as a pretext; to put aside; to press/to push/to force
寄せ付ける: (よせつける) - (often used in the negative as 寄せ付けない, etc.) to let (someone) come near; to let (someone) get close
寄せ合う: (よせあう) - to press against each other; to huddle together
寄せ場: (よせば) - gathering place; labour camp for drifters, criminals, etc. (Edo period); entertainment hall (for rakugo, manzai, magic, music, etc.)/vaudeville theater (theatre)/music hall
寄せ太鼓: (よせだいこ) - {sumo} drums sounded in the morning to draw the crowds to a match
寄せ席: (よせせき) - entertainment hall (for rakugo, manzai, magic, music, etc.); vaudeville theater (theatre); music hall
寄せ掛ける: (よせかける) - to rest or lean against
寄せ書き: (よせがき) - write jointly; collection of autographs
寄せ木細工: (よせぎざいく) - wooden mosaic work; parquetry; wooden mosaic (e.g. on a piece of furniture); marquetry; marqueterie
寄せ木造り: (よせぎづくり) - joined block construction of a statue
寄せ棟: (よせむね) - hipped roof; hip roof; hipped roof construction; hip roof construction
寄せ棟屋根: (よせむねやね) - hipped roof; hip roof
寄せ棟造: (よせむねづくり) - hip roof; hipped roof; building with a hip roof
寄せ棟造り: (よせむねづくり) - hip roof; hipped roof; building with a hip roof
寄せ波: (よせなみ) - incoming wave; surf; swash; comber; beachcomber
寄せ箸: (よせばし) - drawing a dish towards oneself using one's chopsticks (a breach of etiquette)
寄せ鍋: (よせなべ) - pot of chicken or seafood, and vegetables in a dashi broth, usu. cooked at the table (traditionally a winter meal); seafood and vegetable stew or chowder
寄せ集め: (よせあつめ) - mish-mash; miscellany; medley; odds and ends; gathering
寄せ集める: (よせあつめる) - to put together; to gather; to collect; to scrape together
寄っかかる: (よっかかる) - to lean against; to recline on
寄ってたかって: (よってたかって) - forming a crowd; ganging up on; joining forces against
寄って集って: (よってたかって) - forming a crowd; ganging up on; joining forces against
寄っ掛る: (よっかかる) - to lean against; to recline on
寄らば大樹の陰: (よらばたいじゅのかげ) - Look for a big tree when you want shelter; Serve the powerful for your own good
寄り: (yori) - afastar o oponente enquanto está em combate próximo; ter uma tendência para, estar próximo de
寄りかかる: (よりかかる) - to lean against; to recline on; to lean on; to rely on; to depend on
寄り倒し: (よりたおし) - {sumo} knocking an opponent over while holding his belt
寄り切り: (よりきり) - {sumo} holding opponent's belt while pushing from the ring
寄り切る: (よりきる) - {sumo} to force someone out of the ring
寄り合い: (よりあい) - meeting/gathering; village assembly; {sumo} two wrestlers approaching each other
寄り合い所帯: (よりあいじょたい) - (yoji) congeries of many households; scratch (combined) team; hodge podge of parties
寄り合う: (よりあう) - to gather; to meet
寄り掛かる: (よりかかる) - to lean against; to recline on; to lean on; to rely on; to depend on
寄り掛る: (よりかかる) - to lean against; to recline on; to lean on; to rely on; to depend on
寄り添う: (よりそう) - to get close; to cuddle close together; to nestle close to; to snuggle up to
寄り縋る: (よりすがる) - to cling to; to rely on
寄り身: (よりみ) - {sumo} pushing an opponent out with one's body
寄り道: (よりみち) - dropping in on the way; breaking one's journey; making a stopover; going out of one's way
寄り集まる: (よりあつまる) - to gather together
寄る: (よる) - to approach/to draw near/to come near/to be close to; to gather (in one place)/to come together/to meet; to stop by (while on one's way to another place)/to drop by/to make a short visit; to grow old/to grow high (number, etc.); (in the form of しわが寄る) to grow (wrinkly); (also written as 倚る, 凭る) to lean against/to recline on; {sumo} to push one's opponent while holding their belt; to decide on a price and come to a deal; to be swayed by (a person)/to yield to
寄ると触ると: (よるとさわると) - whenever they come together
寄る年波には勝てない: (よるとしなみにはかてない) - Nobody can struggle against advancing age
寄る辺: (よるべ) - place to go; person to turn to or depend on; one's resort
寄付ける: (よせつける) - (often used in the negative as 寄せ付けない, etc.) to let (someone) come near; to let (someone) get close
寄付行為: (きふこうい) - act of endowment or donation
寄付金を募る: (きふきんをつのる) - to make an appeal for contributions; to collect donations
寄切る: (よりきる) - {sumo} to force someone out of the ring
寄合: (よりあい) - meeting/gathering; village assembly; {sumo} two wrestlers approaching each other

寄坐: (よりまし) - child or doll used as a vessel for a spirit invoked by a shaman or miko
寄場: (よせば) - gathering place; labour camp for drifters, criminals, etc. (Edo period); entertainment hall (for rakugo, manzai, magic, music, etc.)/vaudeville theater (theatre)/music hall
寄宿学校: (きしゅくがっこう) - boarding school

寄宿料: (きしゅくりょう) - fee for board and lodging
寄宿舎: (きしゅくしゃ) - boarding house; school dormitory
